name: Zombie Monocyclist
description:
Control your Zombie using your voice! Or at lease try to!

Voice control requires Windows 10, sorry :(

The game provides alternative controls: Q, A, E, D, Space, Shift (but the experience is not the same)





A game by:
Kornel - project lead, programming
Paweł - programming, effects
Dominik - zombie mascot model
Michał - additional programming
Game music - freesounds.org - Michael-DB
Chill tune for games - freesounds.org - Xythe
POLYGON - Starter Pack & Simple Apocalypse - by Synty Studios
Lava Flowing Shader - Starter Pack - Moonflower Carnivore
